Team Profile
function (manager) { return `

${manager.getName}

Manager

ID: ${manager.getId}

Email: ${manager.getEmail}

Office Number: ${manager.getOfficeNumber}

`; } function (engineer) { return `

${engineer.name}

Engineer

ID: ${engineer.id}

Email: ${engineer.email}

Github: ${engineer.github}

` } function (intern) { return `

${intern.name}

Intern

ID: ${intern.id}

Email:${intern.email}

School: ${intern.school}

` }
